entry.title: New Release - 0.1.0
entry.summary: We are very pleased to announce this initial release of the Cake.Chocolatey.Module.

entry.title: New Release - 0.1.1
entry.summary: Looks like I missed an important step when committing everything for what I thought was going to be the 0.1.0 release! I forgot to include the Cake.Chocolatey.Module.nuspec file, which is used to package up the NuGet package, and which is ultimately used as a trigger for whether a deployment to nuget.org is actually required.
